name: Account Balances Summary
query:
WITH gl_entry AS (
SELECT
	account,
	IF(SUM(debit) > SUM(credit), SUM(debit) - SUM(credit), 0) AS debit,
	IF(SUM(credit) > SUM(debit), SUM(credit) - SUM(debit), 0) AS credit
FROM
	`tabGL Entry`
WHERE
	is_cancelled = 0
AND
	posting_date <= %(to_date)s
GROUP BY
	account
)
SELECT
	account.account_number,
	account.account_name,
	account.parent_account,
	IFNULL(gl_entry.debit, 0) AS debit,
	IFNULL(gl_entry.credit, 0) AS credit
FROM
	`tabAccount` account
LEFT JOIN
	gl_entry
ON
	account.name = gl_entry.account
WHERE
	account.restrict_account_view = 'No'
AND
	account.is_group = 0
GROUP BY
	account.name,
	account.account_number,
	account.account_name,
	account.parent_account
ORDER BY
	account.parent_account,
	account.account_number
